  • Method Details

    • getAllStations

      @GetMapping("/{city}/stations") public List<InputStation> getAllStations(@PathVariable String city)
      Endpoint to get all stations with name and coordinates
      Parameters:
      city - name of the selected city
      Returns:
      list with all stations for given city

    • getLines

      @GetMapping("/{city}/lines") public List<InputLineEdge> getLines(@RequestParam(required=false) String lineId, @PathVariable String city)
      All geografic lines for given city
      Parameters:
      lineId - (optional) if not null, only edges for a specific line are returned
      city - name of the selected city
      Returns:
      list with all lines of given city

    • getGridGraph

      @GetMapping("/{city}/gridgraph") public GridGraph getGridGraph(@PathVariable String city)
      returns entire grid graph for given city. Caution: Can be empty, if graph has not been calculated yet.
      Parameters:
      city - name of the selected city
      Returns:
      grid graph

    • getOctilinearGraph

      @GetMapping("/{city}/octilinear") public List<List<GridEdge>> getOctilinearGraph(@PathVariable String city, @RequestParam(required=false) double gridSize, @RequestParam(required=false) double distanceR)
      Calculates octilinear grid graph, or returns already calculated graph if city, grid size and r has not changed.
      Parameters:
      city - name of the selected city
      gridSize - distance in km between each grid vertex (width of a grid cell)
      distanceR - search radius for source/target candidates
      Returns:
      list of grid edges for all paths on all lines.
